name: Angry Sticky - If You Are Still Bored To Death, Play This
name_original: Angry Sticky - If You Are Still Bored To Death, Play This
description:
Sticky is back! With more fun gameplay.

This game is best played when:

◉ You're angry and annoyed!!!

◉ You're bored to death and wish you could do something useful but you just can't

◉ Your girlfriend left you

◉ Your mommy grounded you to your room

◉ You want to play an endless procedural based level game that will make you rip your pants in fury, making you come back for more

But don't take my word for it, go ahead and download it, and get annoyed.

If you like the game and want to support further updates, please write or update your review on the AppStore!

Thanks :)
